plot: Facing his family's hypocrisy during New Year's Eve, Alejandro realizes he has the same flaws he criticizes.
title: Año nuevo
plot_es: Facing his family's hypocrisy during New Year's Eve, Alejandro realizes he has the same flaws he criticizes.
plot_en: Facing his family's hypocrisy during New Year's Eve, Alejandro realizes he has the same flaws he criticizes.
